website_summaries.verdict: An affordable alternative to expensive red-green prescription lenses. Does not correct other forms of colorblindness, however. A great "first" pair for the newly diagnosed.
pros: Provides higher definition color spectrum in general
Enhances red and green traffic signs and lights
cons: Minimal improvement reported on some color blindness tests

customer_reviews.title: I admit I was very skeptical and hoped he wouldn't be disappointed. I played it off like they were my ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband for his birthday. I admit I was very skeptical and hoped he wouldn't be disappointed. I played it off like they were my sun glasses and there was something on the lens I couldn't get off. He ended up putting them on to see what I was talking about and all of a sudden got very emotional! My house is surrounded by trees full of green leaves! On our way to lunch he was pointing out signs, buildings etc that had green or red on them. Extremely pleased with the product! My husband's response was priceless! Ordering a pair for my daughters boyfriend. He has problems with red/green. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The seller will give you $20.00 for a good feed back.
customer_reviews.text: I am red-green color blind, Everything turns red, I see no help at all , Things look better with out the glasses. The blue sky turns reddish blue. I am sending them back to Amazon. Sorry I do not like to send things back. The picture is the paper that comes with the Glasses, So that tells you something.
customer_reviews.author: T Tice

customer_reviews.title: The look of the glasses are nice, however
customer_reviews.text: The look of the glasses are nice, however, I had three different color blind people try them out with no earth shattering effect. They have a red tone to the lens so it definitely can’t be used indoors without making everything cast with red. Outdoors, none of the three could tell any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Ah well...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is red/green color blind. I have wished he could see the amazing array of colors in the world. I purchased these as a Valentine’s Day gift. Unfortunately, they made very little difference. He said that colors weren’t different- maybe a little brighter. He was probably saying that to make me feel better. I will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Suzann M. Look

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: We apologize for the no shirt but I wasn't even going to record this and certainly did not think that the glasses would work so well! You can see for yourself. :-) They are a little lightweight but come in a very nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not bothet
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The glasses lasted almost 3 months before an arm broke off! I am red/green color blind and these glasses really help me see red. That being said, they make greens LESS vivid. So they were really cool for a few days and now they're just weird sunglasses for which I paid $78. The thrill is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Just waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: For $80 I'm expecting some type of quality to the frames at least. The 3D Movie's give you better frames than this. And to top it off, I didn't see "color" the shades are pink, so that's all you see through them. I didn't pass any Ishira text circles I didn't pass before.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Munoz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work so well retook the color blind test still could not see the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: I called him out into the yard and told him that the glasses made me see funny and that maybe he should try them
customer_reviews.text: I was excited but nervous for these to arrive for my boyfriend's birthday. I called him out into the yard and told him that the glasses made me see funny and that maybe he should try them. He put them in and said, "I see clearer, what is this?!" He loves them and wears them everywhere. My only advice on improvement would be that they offer more styles.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: so I'm skeptical they really work for 90% I easily returned to Amazon (although the company doesn't want you ...
customer_reviews.text: Although they warn you that these only for 90% of the users, I believe my son has fairly typical red/green color blindness and they did nothing for him except make things look a little darker, so I'm skeptical they really work for 90% I easily returned to Amazon (although the company doesn't want you to...so they don't get bad feedback) so go ahead and try and maybe they'll work for you but be ready to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: My husband and his brother are both red/green colorblind and both of them had to try really hard to notice any difference, so I returned them. However, I was able to return them very quickly and easily. They email a prepaid shipping label, so you just put them back in the box and send them off. The full refund arrived before I got to the post office to send them back. Since there is no hassle getting a refund, I think it's worth a try. They apparently work very well for some.
customer_reviews.author: Geri Begley

customer_reviews.title: Made More Colors Dull than Bright
customer_reviews.text: I'm moderate deutan (red green colorblind). Definitely didn't have a wow moment. Made me see greens as more of a brownish color/dull, made reds brighter, made a blue sky purple for both me and my non colorblind wife. Seems to add a red tint to everything. Would like to know the science behind these lenses. Not a fan of getting a note in the box telling me not to use Amazon returns or encouraging me to leave a positive review, wonder how many people haven't left a negative review as result. Promptly returning as I don't believe they are effective enough to warrant $78.
customer_reviews.author: dbrand

customer_reviews.title: Genuine
customer_reviews.text: The first-moment experience of viewing through these lenses is one I will never forget; the world truly looks different in normal color. I tried out red-green colorblind tests and passed them, finally, while wearing these lenses. These lenses seem to be very realistic as well; the product is genuine and not a cheap gimmick. The only problem is that they are a little inconvenient because I already wear glasses for vision correction, so I have ordered the clip on lenses and hope they work just as well. I hope that someday, this technology will be offered in a corrective lens and be clear of color; not noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: folk rock man

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted them to work... but no.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes to "fix" my strong deutan colorblindness, but these glasses just didn't do it. I don't doubt that they do help some people, but not me. They made greens look kind of brown. They're definitely NOT indoor/outdoor glasses though. They look too much like sunglasses to wear indoors -- unless you're trying to pull off the indoor shades thing. The packaging was really nice though.
customer_reviews.author: david m. herring

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I expected, but they work.
customer_reviews.text: I have mild protan red-green colorblindness. Before trying these on I took a colorblindness test, loaded some high resolution color wheels and other images with blends of colors and palettes. After trying on the glasses, I took the test again and was diagnosed be as mild duetan, which was interesting. The color wheel was obviously segmented by a specific degree, but the greens became much more segmented. Be sure to have plenty of light, because these glasses have a similar effect to sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Wasteofpaint666

customer_reviews.title: This and 2 other glasses made no difference- save your $
customer_reviews.text: I went to the chart, picked the brand and model according to the vision impairment that my colorblind family member had and got the glasses. They made no difference. We went back and ordered two more different pairs, none of these made any difference. I never really understood how if you had a genetic deficiency to detect color how a para glasses would make a difference. I don’t get it. The seemingly miraculous improvement shown on TV/YouTube was certainly not reproduced using three different models. I guess it’s worth a shot, but realistically it didn’t make sense from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Eshopperaholic

customer_reviews.title: It’s a new world
customer_reviews.text: My wife surprised me with a pair today. To say I was moved is beyond words. I’ve seen the world in 4 or 5 colors my 48 years on earth and today it changed. I’m a tough old cop and this almost had me in tears. Thank you to the doctors and scientists that cared enough to chase this technology. If you know someone who has color blindness or deficiency find a way to buy them these today. Don’t wait!!! David
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Worked as Described :)
customer_reviews.text: My dad has red-green color blindness, and he liked them. It took him a moment to take everything in, but as we were asking him about colors, he could identify colors that he couldn't make out before. For example, I had on a floral shirt that had pink flowers with green leaves. Without the glasses, he said everything looked green, but with the glasses, he could identify that there were pink flowers. These wouldn't be something that you'd probably want to wear around everywhere, but I think they are something awesome to have so that people with red-green color blindness can experience colors they are usually not able to see.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I am now a believer!!
customer_reviews.text: They work! I don't know if my son is seeing the same colors as I am, but he is now able to see different numbers on a color test that he was not able to see before. I am amazed, happy, excited and a little stunned they worked. We waited and waited because we had asked a few professionals what they thought and they were skeptical. My son kept insisting we at least try and wow, they work. To what degree they work, I do not know. But he says things look different and brighter. Very happy we got these for him. Almost brought tears to my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Momwith2boys

customer_reviews.title: Makes difference!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband as a gift, he is red green color blind. I gave them to him while he was watching wizard of oz (the original) he was fascinated by all the different colors of green, purple and red. He didn't recognize the color orange and in some ways he was frustrated. (Not the reaction I expected) I bought these with the hope he could finally see the difference in colors of wires when working on electronics... I have always been his "eyes". Unfortunately, he still has problems when it comes to bundles of multi colored wires. The glasses are well made, the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnot work
customer_reviews.text: Iam sorry guys if you are really red green color blind this product will not work. Me and my friend together looked at the color blind test samples things she could see i couldnot see with the glasses on . I am sad with the people who lied and posted all the exicting videos . I had prime thats why i ordered it . I returned it with in 10 minutes of trying and not seeing the colors all my hopes and dreams os seeing how other people see color was squished like a little can crushed by 18 wheeler . Sad😢
customer_reviews.author: Bipin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My brother and sister and I bought these for my father who is in his late 60's. It was amazing to see him put these on and react to, "that is what flowers look like?", "Our house is what color?" "Tell me again what color your shirt is, I need to learn what all of these new colors are called". This is an amazing product at a good price. Do not hesitate and order them today!
customer_reviews.author: ColeSlaw

customer_reviews.title: They work, give them time.
customer_reviews.text: Took some time for his eyes to adjust. I got them for my 11 year old son and he opened them yesterday as a holiday gift. Today I got a text that read “thank you for letting me see colors for Christmas. It’s beautiful outside.” They aren’t top of the line, but they made an impact and I’m touched. My son saw purple for the first time in his life.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J. March

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend who is red-green color blind and he instantly saw he difference. He was asking me if all the colors he was seeing for the first time were correct and he was right. Now they did send a little card where if you write a review you get $20 but this is 100% not appart of that. I am writing an honest review and I would recommend these to anyone who is red-green color blind. Another this, the glasses case is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie, I was hoping for a miracle with these considering my dad is extremely bad with his color blindness. He can only tell the difference on a Sunny day outside. He was the best candidate to try these on. 2 thumbs down!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Wawrzynski

customer_reviews.title: My dad says they work
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my very active 88 yr old, severely color blind dad. He could see that the brown and green grass (it’s winter) was actually 2 colors, not one! He lives on a marina and said Hey! That hull is red! I always thought it was sort of a dark brick color! He says driving (yes, I know, 88...) is easier because there’s more definition of color. His world is just brighter, and he likes them a lot. I was hoping for a big video moment, but honestly it took him 2 days to appreciate them. My son (24) is also color blind, and his reaction was that everything seemed just brighter, but he could see reds better.
customer_reviews.author: dfwproducer

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are very nice, my 14 year old son has had a slight (protan) red/green color blindness. I gave him a color test christmas eve and he stumbled through it struggling with some of the test. He certainly was identified as being color blind. After I gave him his glasses on christmas, he did the same test again. He flew through it with ease and was able to see everything perfectly. the results came back normal vision and the only one he missed he said the right answer and just pushed the wrong number. It didn't sink in until a few minutes later that he now can see perfectly. it was such a touching moment.
customer_reviews.author: ryan olszewski

customer_reviews.title: Sadly they didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Sadly they didn’t work. My nephew just said “the grass looks orange!”. We were all hoping them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Kroupensky

customer_reviews.title: Life changing experience!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are amazing! I got a pair for a very dear friend of ours who is an artist! His painting are amazing, but he could never see them like we could see them. He was blown away when I brought these glasses to him at his art show. He couldn't stop looking at his beautiful paintings! And the next day he couldn't get over how blue the sky was. It was a very emotional experience and it was so fun to be able to be a part of that experience. So thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Curly Q

customer_reviews.title: Interesting
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a friend for Christmas. I was hoping for one of those huge reactions to seeing full color for the first time. However, he just said it made the browns he usually sees into red. I think that it would be good for a kid because they haven't adjusted to life being color blind. My friend is in his late 20's and is so used to seeing things his way that the addition of new color didn't really effect him. But, he did say he can see reds, so that is a win.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo Griffith

customer_reviews.title: There’s nothing like watching someone so completely in shock by seeing colors ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes they work. Now the company states they work for 90% of people so if you see someone complaining they don’t work that’s probably why. I bought these for my friend who has been color blind forever. He put them on and his face went completely blank. There’s nothing like watching someone so completely in shock by seeing colors the way we all see them. He put them on and off about 30 times in a row just looking around at everything. He also took the color test after i left and told me he passed it for the first time ever!
customer_reviews.author: Alan ran perry

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing to correct my color blindness! Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pair of glasses
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pair of glasses. Very well made and good quality. Unfortunately they did not help my husbands red-green color blindness, but I know that color blindness is not the same for everyone, and I'm sure these would help some. I did request a return slip from Golden Mermaid and I received it immediately. I sent them back to Golden Mermaid and they gave me a full refund with no problems at all. Very good company, and high quality glasses. If you are red-green colorblind you should give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy R.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they work!!
customer_reviews.text: If you or a loved one suffers from red/green color blindness, you need to get these glasses!! I got these for my husband's birthday and for the first time he was able to distinguish different shades of color. He was even able to see things he'd never noticed before like flowers on a shrub. It had all blended together into a grey color before. It was very heartwarming to see him experience all of the colors of nature for the first time! I highly recommend these glasses!!
customer_reviews.author: simplify610

customer_reviews.title: He described the experience as everything being shaded like heavily polarized sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for my father. But perhaps his red/green color blindness is out of the spectrum that is corrected. He described the experience as everything being shaded like heavily polarized sunglasses, but green and red still appeared as the same shaded color. Delivery and return were very easy and responsive. The product does appear to work for some, so I think its worth a shot because returns and refunds were quick and easy
customer_reviews.author: Spenser Harvey

customer_reviews.title: These work !!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11 yr old son. Went into the backyard where I had him tell me the colors he saw in a multitude of flowers we have. He then put the glasses on and was mystified at how green the grass was, the blue in the sky, he was amazed at all the colors of the flowers. I'm so pleased I tried this cheaper version and love the results. Now my kido won't be so mismatched when dressing himself.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He was pretty impressed at the differences in color and vibrancy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and they worked exactly as I had hoped. He was pretty impressed at the differences in color and vibrancy. We built a cedar privacy fence this summer, it's absolutely beautiful. He can really see the difference in the color of the fence and he could see the beauty that I could see in it. He was in awe. Even the differences of the colors in a pile of leaves!! We got them yesterday and he's taking them to work with him today. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my brother. He is green red color blind. They did nothing for him at all. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. I bought them for myself being color blind and tired of missing out seeing what everyone else sees. I only wish I bought them sooner. I am red/green color blind and my world without the glasses is a vague gray/green and gray world. Now when I am outdoors, I see all the beautiful colors and am astounded at how much I missed. a great product for the price. I am very satisfied with them and would buy them again. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie D.

customer_reviews.title: 80-year-old sees color first time
customer_reviews.text: We bought these glasses for my Father's 80th birthday, since he's never seen the colors we see. He was almost giddy with excitement as he looked at the sky, grass, flowers, etc! I like that he can use them both indoors and outside, too, unlike the more expensive brand. Thank you for giving him this opportunity!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Beard

customer_reviews.title: What a “Wow” experience
customer_reviews.text: My husband is green-red color blind and I researched so many products. Then I found these glasses. I watched numerous videos and finally I decided to push the button before the fall colors disappeared. We were driving to our farm and I handed him his sunglasses. To his surprise they were his “new color blindness” glasses. Watching him “see” reds! Watching him see the beautiful colors that he had NEVER seen in 52 years! I was crying and he was crying... the words “THAT’S RED!” was such an emotional moment. Thank you for giving him this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Passed color blind test but company is paying for good reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the for a friend of mine. I then gave him a color blind test from YouTube and he was able to determine the numbers with the glasses on vs. with the glasses off. I don't think he is red/green color blind but he said he had a better time determining purples and browns. Update post payment: While the above statements are true, when I first opened the box I saw the attached note saying that they are paying for good reviews. Since this was a Christmas gift for a friend, I was pretty furious. They did actually send me $20 via PayPal. So, whether they work or not, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick12289

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok nothing spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Open the package expected aluminum frame as the description said but got plastic frame. For me it made the reds a bright red. Greens a dull green but other than that everything is the same. Grass is still the same color and trees the same. Others may have different levels of color blindness. It may work better for someone with a different level. I wish they were aluminum as described and a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I have decent color vision but I am always mis-placing things that are red and green. And I cant make it past the first page in those Dot test books. These glasses sadly did not help me at all. I was really hoping I could use them to... 'sneak' through a physical test for a job application. Oh well. They do make some colors Pop out at you more but that is about it.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to write this twice I’m not sure what’s going on. My 11 year old son got these as a Christmas gift. This was by far the best gift we purchased. They are more like sunglasses so we will save for a different pair that he can wear to school. It was amazing to watch him go around the house just starring at things! Please note in the video my daughter is asking silly questions she doesn’t quite understand that he can see colors they are just different.
customer_reviews.author: Elva

customer_reviews.title: Not Blown Away
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. I do not have other color-blind glasses to compare them with, so it's hard to rate them. They are more shaded than they appear in the photo though. They do make reds and pinks much brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Angie E.

customer_reviews.title: Would order again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift to my husband. He was a bit skeptical putting them on and maybe even in denial for the first few minutes. He stood there taking the glasses off and putting them on pointing to different objects asking what the actual color was and was amazed at how much of a difference they made! He wears them all the time, We went to a family event where his moms cousin was who has the same coloblindness and he tried them on and told his wife he wanted a pair too. We just found out a family friend has a son with the same coloblindness and reccomended these glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Product is almost as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have taken many color blind tests in the Military and outside the Military. The colors I have issues with are red and green. I decided to buy a pair of these glasses because I did not want tp spend $300-$400 for enchroma. Today they were delivered and retook the online color blind tests. There were some numbers that I still could not see, however, there were some numbers that did become visible. I tried them outside, and noticed that the colors on flowers changed, specifically, the red and pink flowers. So, I have to give it a Four star rating, because I could not see all the numbers in the test but did better then expected.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Changing a child’s life
customer_reviews.text: I could cry. My 11 year old son was diagnosed with red-green about 4 years ago. We bought the “expensive”- big name color blind glasses for him, but he was too young to appreciate $650 glasses and they only lasted a few days. We bought these two days ago and they arrived today. He put them on and was like “woah! This is awesome!” I was thinking he was just excited about the idea of having glasses. He took the color blind test with them on and passed with normal vision both times he took it! For the price, I’m planning on getting him a second set! Thank you so much for this.
customer_reviews.author: fnp

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I did not know I was red-green colorblind until my freshman year in college when I got to the page in the Psyc book that had those colorblind test with the little circles -- I guess you don't miss what you never had. It was sunny on Christmas day and I was absolutely amazed at the results -- especially reds. I always thought the green traffic lights were gray! I recommend them to others who are red-green colorblind!!
customer_reviews.author: Deacon

customer_reviews.title: They work!! Really
customer_reviews.text: My 24 yr old son has been sending me requests for glasses like these forever. Well I finally broke down, I must admit I got all terry eyed when he put them on and said WOW, there is soooo much red in the house!! ❤️ Today he sent me this text: Soo i took a colorblind test with and without the glasses and it says mild deutan when wearing them but strong deutan without them. (Red green deficient) so they work!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: J. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for color deficient !
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were the perfect Christmas gift to our son who is color blind. For years hes been looking at us strangely when we say he doesn't match. Today he saw AQUA for the 1st time ever and wanted to know what it was called. Seeing shades of reds and purples and greens has never happened before. HE is wearing them with his contacts and so far wont take them off!!! 100% PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrsmacs

customer_reviews.title: red-green corrective glasses
customer_reviews.text: It makes me sad that my husband can not see colors the way I can, he is red-green color blind. My daughter sent me a video of a man who with corrective glasses could see color, so I searched Amazon and found these. Although they do not work for him inside, but outside they change his world, especially with the color red, which to him before, looked a lot like green. I want to take him on a trip up north in the fall when the leaves change, and I can not wait for that day to see the look on his face...!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna :)

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so stunned by these glasses!. My grandson is 100% colorblind. We bought him the very expensive Enchroma brand and he cried when he was able to see the colors. Unfortunately he lost them and so the idea of paying $400 for glasses was sickening. So, I took my chances and purchased these Pilestone glasses for $89 on Amazon. I was sure I'd have to send them back since you reiterated that it was only for red/green color blindness. BUT, guess what??? They are BETTER than the Enchroma and he can use them indoors and not have it so dark in the room! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Aphaivongs

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs, both my sons are colorblind. I told them I have something to give them that I’ve been waiting to give them for a long time. One son is 34 and the other is 30. They had such great responses, it brought me to tears. I’m so happy I bought these glasses for my sons. They work like sunglasses if you’re not colorblind but I guess they work great for people that are. It was beautiful when one of my sons said “my whole life has been a lie, the colors are beautiful. I’m very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lesa

customer_reviews.title: Hold the Ballons! They don’t work.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our Dad, who is Red/Green color blind. We purchased a bunch of balloons, and all got together for this emotional moment. In short, it didn’t work, he couldn’t tell the difference, it was pretty embarrassing. We even went as far as to do the ColorBlind test online where he went from Moderate Protan (without glasses) to Strong Deutan (with glasses). So, I wouldn’t recommend, they do not work. The only good news is that he likes the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Detroit Lion Family

customer_reviews.title: He wore them all weekend I drove him around and he was shocked and amazed on all the colors he was missing out on
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my dad, I kept reading all the reviews just to make sure they work. AND THEY DID!!!! He wore them all weekend I drove him around and he was shocked and amazed on all the colors he was missing out on. After 56 years he finally saw color. I highly recommend these glasses for anyone suffering from color blindness. Best part about the glasses is they are less than $100.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Diaz

customer_reviews.title: No OMG moments for me
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t notice much difference even tho the color vision tests said I’m a prime candidate for the glasses. They made reds and yellows appear brighter but I already knew it was reds and yellows. I was going to return them but dropped them out my car door and ran over them before I could. Guess I’m just stuck with a busted pair of $90 color correcting glasses that didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: James Jegstrup

customer_reviews.title: The best part so far is that I can differentiate the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! At first I was a bit skeptical, but for the price I thought I had to give it a try and sure enough they worked. The best part so far is that I can differentiate the many shades of roses that grow in my garden. I am sure I will buy another pair to leave in my car when I am traveling through the beautiful country of New Zealand in which I now live. Thanks so much and your continued research is much appreciated for the rest of the color deficient people in the world. Cheers Rob Haugen
customer_reviews.author: Mr Robert F Haugen

customer_reviews.title: They may work
customer_reviews.text: They seem to make the color more vivid for my color blind boyfriend but he doesn't seem to wear them much (because he is color blind and still cant tell if he can see the colors properly) we tried taking the red-green colorblind test after owning and wearing the glasses but he still cannot see the numbers. I am not color blind and do not see a difference, only a little tint when I wear the glasses. My red-green colorblind boyfriend thinks colors are more vivid. It is still difficult to tell if he can see colors better though.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I can't see clearly now
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived well packaged with a bit of delayed delivery time. We were excited to purchase this as a gift for a family member who is color blind. They did not like them as it distorted color rather than being able to see color. Would not reccomend nor purchase again. Returned them with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: MPLH

customer_reviews.title: Incredible difference!
customer_reviews.text: I have dealt with my colorblindness for decades by simply laughing off the problem when I said something embarrassing, but when I first put these glasses on, I was shocked at the colors invading my sight. I have always seen most reds as brown, and seeing the difference between greens and reds pretty much never happened. These glasses have changed my sunny days into awesome views full of vibrant colors. I’m grateful for these glasses, and they have made seeing colors possible for me after many decades of very limited color perception. Best $90 I’ve spent in decades!
customer_reviews.author: Alan S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for an amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!! Awesome price! I purchased these for my 10 year old boy. He was blown away when he could finally differentiate his reds, oranges and blues. I am not able to get him to take them off. I can’t believe these glasses worked. Great product and highly recommended for anyone who needs them.
customer_reviews.author: RCY

customer_reviews.title: Works, but world looks ugly.
customer_reviews.text: Looking through this is like looking through a thin bottle of red wine. The world does not look any better wearing these. But the good news is, it does the least of what you would hope such glasses would do. Taking Enchroma's tests, I would get 'Moderate Deutan' without the glasses, and 'Normal Color Vision' with them on. Just to be sure it wasn't a fluke, I took the test again with and without and got the same results. So while the color of the world might not be accurate, and give everything a somewhat dull reddish hue, it does appear to enhance my ability to differentiate color. At least, the colors you would find on a color blindness test.
customer_reviews.author: James Smyth

customer_reviews.title: I had my doubts, but the work!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my 65 yr old FIL for his bday. Ive never seen the man show emotions, of any kind, but it was all over his face the moment he saw red for the first time. And flowers. And the neon orange sticker on a piece of paper. "WOW! Would you look at that!" he said. I was worried these glasses wouldn't work, and honestly I dont actually know what he sees now, but its clearly different than what he saw before. And it made him happy. He said it was the best gift he'd ever gotten.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for my son!
customer_reviews.text: They worked! The males in my family have different severities of color blindness. I purchased these for my son and he looked around in wonderment. Then when he saw the poinsettia, he pointed and said “ no way!”. The color difference between the red and green he had never seen. He then proceeded to find those colorblind dot tests, he passed them all with the glasses on! When my nephew and dad came over ( they are also colorblind) they were able to see a difference but not as pronounced as my son did. All suffer from the red/green color blindness, but obviously they have different severity. For the price, worth trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Gene K.

customer_reviews.title: He saw purple for the first time ever!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old stepson didn't have a huge emotional reaction to putting these on, but throughout the day he kept asking, what's that color? or he'd say, these two colors look the same until I put my glasses on!! He has worn them every day since Christmas and has them on when he comes out of his room in the morning! This proves to me that they make a difference! The color blind tests that he did said he is severly color blind to only mildly color blind with these glasses. They are well made and come in a modern, sturdy case. I'm so happy I spent the money on these!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bishir

customer_reviews.title: There are better deuteranomaly glasses out there.
customer_reviews.text: I have a heavy red-green deuteranomaly and these work sort of, but not completely as well as some glasses on the market, as they don't correct the color they just add a colored hue to help balance out the spectrum to help differentiate the difference between colors one might get confused. You're better off going with a pair that are a little more expensive. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Amy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Sunset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband (who is total red and partial green colorblind) for his birthday. Of course yesterday, here in Arizona, we had a very cloudy day on his birthday. At first he thought they were kind of useless until...he saw the sunset! It wasn't a spectacular sunset from our backyard, but for the first time ever, he saw the pinks and reds that most of us take for granted. It was pretty awesome and now he can enjoy our beautiful AZ sunrises and sunsets!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Pav

customer_reviews.title: Brighter redder reds
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who is red/green color blind....he was happy how the the reds were redder and three was more contrast with all the colors than without the glasses.....using the glasses he scored better on his colorblind test but not perfect..he appreciates the difference in brightness and more vivid contrasts with the flowers and fall foliage colors when wearing the glasses outside and sees more reds and oranges than before
customer_reviews.author: G Dora

customer_reviews.title: They work and they are a great company to work with
customer_reviews.text: I was born fairly severely colorblind. My world is fairly muted and drab. These glasses let me experience the things that most of you take for granted. I can see the gradations of color in a sunrise or sunset. Spring has been an amazing experience so far, I can only imagine Fall. Thank you Pilestone!
customer_reviews.author: Shang Petro and Trin Lea

customer_reviews.title: I was sold a used pair as a new pair got ripped off $92.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package it had been presold and been used already by some one else who left skin oil markes on the nose piece and between the eye brow section on the glasses . Swet stains around the check area on the bottom of the lens and didn't bother to wipe it clean before they returned the glasses for a refund. Finger prints on the lens too. There very light weight and feel so cheap ,like glasses you would get at a 99. Cent store .
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pulley

customer_reviews.title: Give them a try!
customer_reviews.text: Gave glasses to my cousin and my dad. My cousin was in tears when he put them on, he saw purple for the first time! My dad is not as color blind as him though, and the glasses didn't do much for him. I also handed the glasses out to some colorblind coworkers and they were enthralled with them. If you're even thinking about getting these, just do it, it's totally worth it, and if they do not work then they will give you a refund. Nothing to lose!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: did not work as good as tp-016
customer_reviews.text: I had great results with the TP-016 glasses but image is a little pixelated. I bought this pair because I was looking for a second pair that would work better in the dark. This glasses did not work at all. I did not pass the color blind test.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harth

customer_reviews.title: " It was an awesome thing to experience
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for my dad. He put them on, and the tears started flowing (he is NOT usually a crier). After some time looking around inside with them on, we walked outside, and he said, "Oh yeah. I can tell the difference in green and brown!" It was an awesome thing to experience; I'm so glad these worked for him!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for any of the 3 family members who tried them
customer_reviews.text: Red/Green colorblindness runs rampant in the men in my family. I bought a pair of these hoping for the big reaction that so many others had. THREE colorblind family members tried them and they all said the colors looked brighter but they didn't really see any they hadn't seen before. So, needless to say, the product didn't work for any of them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Might work for some. Not us.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do much at all for our son, who according to their online test examples would benefit from these. Just filtered the colors a bit, but didn't help him differentiate anything at all better than before.
customer_reviews.author: Tim R

customer_reviews.title: Two out of three ain’t bad
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have a mind blowing experience seeing new colors. I was going to return them and the seller had no problems with me retiring them. After wearing the glasses a few more times I decided to keep the glasses. I can distinguish reds from browns. Also, I can tell the difference between purple and blue. I still get mixed up with greens and other colors, but in the words of Meatloaf “Two out of three ain’t bad.”
customer_reviews.author: stdrgh14

customer_reviews.title: Blessing
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was very skeptical and my husband is a man of very few words and I really thought it was going to be a waste of money but it really wasn't the videos you see if people getting very emotional are very real sometimes it takes a few minutes or a little while to set in that they are truly seeing a difference but it's like giving something someone never thought they would have it's so awesome
customer_reviews.author: Vachonski Allison

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color spectrum!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my red green color blind son and purchased the clip on glasses for my dad. They have made a world of difference for them! I can't imagine a life without all the colors and both my dad and son are in awe of the reds and greens they are seeing. They even said the yellows and blues are more vibrant and diverse. These are worth every penny for the red/green color blind.
customer_reviews.author: Great Pyr Mom

customer_reviews.title: Really good service
customer_reviews.text: The company gave me really good service when I found the glasses did not quite do what I expected, otherwise I would have certainly given five stars. An important note—in my comparative testing, these glasses performed on a par with a pair I tried at over 3 times the cost, they just didn't give me the particular result I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff E

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Deal
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a color blind friend who is also an artist. Pretty much every youtube video you see of the shock and emotion of seeing certain colors for the first time happened to my friend. 100% worth it. Just make sure you get the right kind. As far as I know they make (red/green) and (blue/yellow) color blind correction glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Badsteak

customer_reviews.title: Got this for the White Elephant game at Christmas. ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the White Elephant game at Christmas. I have 4 boys and all are colorblind. The glasses are okay, but cheaply made and did not get the response I wanted. In hind sight I wish I had of sprung for the most costly ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for color blind father
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased as a gift for my dad, who is color blind. They didn't work at all--he likened wearing them to wearing sunglasses, where every color shifts according to the color of the lenses; however, they did not allow him to see colors he previously could not see. He was color blind with or without the glasses. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Goedeke

customer_reviews.title: They helped make colors much brighter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Brother and he said they helped make everything brighter, and for the first time he can see the red and green! He was so pleased and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Wow! My dad can see better than ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted to get some color blind glasses for my red/green colorblind glasses for My dad. He has used them for a year on and off for special occasions. He regularly tells us how lovely the sunset, fireworks, and holiday decor are (plus more) with these glasses. He loves seeing all these things in new ways! This style is really affordable!
customer_reviews.author: OpinionatedHijabi

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Just a red pink tint. Makes it worse.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lamb

customer_reviews.title: They are well made and have a great hard case
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these glasses for my husband on his birthday. They are well made and have a great hard case. Unfortunately, my husband is in the 10% that they don't work for, so I had to return them. Pilestone was easy to work with on the return.
customer_reviews.author: L Leone

customer_reviews.title: 73 year old sees red for the first time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my red/green color blind grandfather. Mostly reds he can not see. He has always thought he drove a brown truck and for the first time he saw red. We had to tell him what color it was. My daughter was wearing a pink shirt and blue shorts. He couldn't believe she had on two different colors the whole time. I was very pleasantly surprised with the results. My grandpa is 73 years old and he is like a little kid looking around now. He had no idea there was so many colors. Thank you for the amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: RJanes

customer_reviews.title: Little change!
customer_reviews.text: My son, aged 50, reports that he sees some new color, but there isn’t enough change to make them worthwhile. Save your money. New technology is just around the corner. He loved the case they came in!
customer_reviews.author: Sharae-s Quatermass

customer_reviews.title: Seems to really work!
customer_reviews.text: These have been a good investment for the most part . My boyfriend has actually taken them to work to help him decipher some of the color coding the company uses ! I just wanted him to be able to see color so it has turned out to be a great gift !
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my son
customer_reviews.text: It just seems to make everything have a pink hue. Didn't help my son's color blind vision at all. He has difficulty with green and red colors. He can see bright green and bright red okay, but light reds and greens just look grey to him. We were hoping this would help him, but it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: B. Corwin

customer_reviews.title: I am a red green color blind woman
customer_reviews.text: I and 1 of 1500 women in the entire world that's reported colorblind. In my entire life I have gone being told that I had a learning disability when in fact I was simply color blind. The moment I put these glasses on my entire world changed. Flipped turned upside down. I could not be happier to be able to see the world around me to be able to see colors I never even knew existed. I recommend this product to anyone who suffers from red green color blindness. This product will CHANGE YOUR LIFE.
customer_reviews.author: lainefaye

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate these a zero I would. My fiance was really excited to try these as he suffers from red and green color blindness. When he tried them he said all he could now see is red and it didn't improve his color blindness and in fact made it worse. As these were a Christmas present and a big gift for him it brought us alot of disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: KittyCat

customer_reviews.title: He was a brilliant red head as a child and now has two ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in his 40s and has never seen red, brown, or green as distinct colors. He was a brilliant red head as a child and now has two children with brilliant red hair. He’s always known that was significant because of the way people talked to him and the way they now talk to our children. I got these glasses for him for Christmas. When he put them on he was completely overwhelmed and he said that now he understands why everyone make such a fuss over redheads. It’s been so much fun for him and for our whole family!
customer_reviews.author: 5redpeppers

customer_reviews.title: Seeing reds and greens for the first time in 91 years!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 91 year old father so he could enjoy playing UNO with us because he could not tell the difference in the red and green cards. He was delighted to get these glasses and be able to play with us. Not to mention enjoying the colors of the outdoors, etc. He told me he wished he had gotten these decades ago... Great gift idea for your color blind friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Marvelyn

customer_reviews.title: Glasses were good, but service was great!
customer_reviews.text: First, these glasses did not help my colorblindness significantly. They made colors brighter. Purples and reds and blues really popped! But I could see these colors before, just not this brightly. So they didn't work for me in the way that I hoped, but they might for you depending on what type colorblindness you have. But the company's service was outstanding! There was no problem returning the glasses and receiving my refund. If you are not sure if these will help or not, I think you can feel safe trying them for yourself. I was not reimbursed for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Worry free purchase-if it doesn’t work, send them back!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 83 year old father, who has pretty bad color blindness, especially with green. Unfortunately, these particular glasses did not help, but the customer service at pilestone (I spoke with Ben) was exceptional! I just had to send my order number and he said they will send a refund and then we return the glasses. He said I can order as many pairs as I wanted, for my father to try, and if none of them work, they will give us a full refund. He was so kind and really wanted to make sure that we are satisfied...a rare occurrence these days! Thanks so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy B.

customer_reviews.title: They don’t work.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were purchased as a gift for a dear friend with color blindness. When he opened the gift, he knew immediately what they were. He was instantly excited and scrambled to open the box. Upon putting them on, they did not work. We had bright colors around so it would enhance the color seeing experience, but I did not work. We thought maybe going outside during the day would help, but It didn’t. This Product was opened and tried on in front of a large group of people, it was not only disappointing, but it was embarrassing for the recipient. Really wish they worked for multiple reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these, as a Christmas present, for my father, whom is red/green colorblind. I had a friend of mine who is also colorblind try them out, she was amazed at how well they worked. My father was blown away! The longer he wore them, the more his eyes adjusted to them and the more vibrant the worlds colors became. They are well worth the money. No need to spend a fortune to bring joy to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Christen F.
